title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content:
wheart's to command in the fight against the Absolute.

If Shadowheart continues to be a follower of Shar and could not sacrifice her parents:

The two prisoners were revealed to be Shadowheart's mother and father. Shar commanded her to sacrifice them as a final show of loyalty, but Shadowheart chose to turn her back on her goddess and instead free her parents. Reunited with her family, but with her faith and purpose shattered, Shadowheart's future looks uncertain. She will have a lot to process
